name: XBRL Document
summary: Document written in eXtensible Business Reporting Language (XBRL), an XML -based language; contains business and financial data, such as balance sheets, ledgers, and financial statements; used for communicating and exchanging business performance reports; commonly uses the .XML extension but occasionally appears with the XBRL extension.
